text: Jeffrey Donald 'Jeff' McDill (born March 16, 1956) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey right winger who played in one National Hockey League game for the Chicago Black Hawks during the 1976–77 NHL season. ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Flin Flon Bombers players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Maine Mariners (AHL) players Category:New Haven Nighthawks players Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay Category:Victoria Cougars (1971–94) players Category:Central Professional Hockey League players Category:International Hockey League (1945–2001) players
title: Jeff McDill
